original_text: You have indeed struck down Edom, and your heart has lifted you up. Be content with your glory, and stay at home, for why should you provoke trouble so that you fall, you and Judah with you?”
korean_text: 네가 에돔을 쳐서 파하였으므로 마음이 교만하였으니 스스로 영광을 삼아 왕궁에나 네 집으로 돌아가라 어찌하여 화를 자취하여 너와 유다가 함께 망하고자 하느냐 하나

sentences.original_text: You have indeed struck down Edom,
and your heart has lifted you up.
for why should you provoke trouble
so that you fall, you and Judah with you?”
